<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/68548</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>

    <entry>68548</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120220</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120220</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120220</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Letali z različnima hitrostma glede na zemljo</string>
            <string language="en">Compare Motion in Accelerating Frames</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen Sie Bewegung in beschleunigenfeldern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparez le mouvement dans les trames 
d'accélération</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compare o movimento em frames de aceleração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronti il movimento nei telai accelerare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκρίνετε την κίνηση στην επιτάχυνση των πλαισίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compare el movimiento en marcos de aceleración</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Dve letali letita na krožnem poletu med dvema mestoma s konstantno hitrostjo glede na zrak, le da pri enem piha veter.</string>
            <string language="en">Two planes are flying on a returning flight between two cities with constant speed relative to the air. In one case wind is present and in the other it is not.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hitrost vetra</string>
            <string language="en">wind speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Flächen fliegen auf einen zurückgehenden 
Flug zwischen zwei Städte mit konstanter Geschwindigkeit im 
Verhältnis zu der Luft. In einem Fall ist Wind anwesend und im 
anderen ist er nicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux avions volent sur un vol de renvoi entre deux
villes avec la vitesse constante relativement à l'air. Dans un 
cas le vent est présent et dans l'autre il n'est pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois planos estão voando em um vôo de retorno 
entre duas cidades com velocidade constante relativo ao ar. Em 
um caso o vento está atual e no outro não está.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due aerei stanno volando su un volo di ritorno fra
due città con velocità costante riguardante l'aria. In un caso
il vento è presente e nell'altro non è.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο αεροπλάνα πετούν σε μια πτήση επιστροφής μεταξύ 
δύο πόλεων με τη σταθερή ταχύτητα σχετικά με τον αέρα. Σε 
μια περίπτωση ο αέρας είναι παρών και σε άλλη δεν είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos planos están volando en un vuelo que vuelve 
entre dos ciudades con velocidad constante concerniente al aire. 
En un caso el viento está presente y en el otro no está.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Windgeschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse de vent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">velocidade de vento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">velocità di vento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταχύτητα αέρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">velocidad del viento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">marco de la referencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
